channel.title: Nokia on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Nokia on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Using a Nokia E71 with Asterisk (3G or WiFi)
item.description: There was some talk in one of the IRC chat rooms today about someone trying to get their E61i working with Asterisk. I haven’t had an issue getting that phone or my E71 phone working, but regardless he was having issues. I figured I might as well spend a little bit of time today going through my configuration, both for my own reference, and so that other people can get their Nokia’s setup with Asterisk as well.
